description: Ministry  of City Planning and Water Supply - Approving the acquisition of the immovable properties in Mulankavil, Poonakary D/S Division, Kilinochchi District for the constructions under Mulankavil Water Supply Project and in Hanwella, Badulla D/S Division, Badulla District for the constructions under Badulla Urban Wastewater and Sewerage Project and in Weerakongama Dulthota Sohon Kanatta Pathana, Haldummulla D/S Division, Badulla District for the constructions under Haldummulla-Beragala Water Supply Scheme and the acquisition of servitude right of the land in Alupathakada-Mullepihilla, Kandy & Gangawata Korale D/S Division, Kandy District for the constructions under Kandy & Gangawata Korale, Kandy District for the constructions under Kandy North - Pathadumbara Integrated Water Supply Project and acquisition of Tax rights of the land portion in Welusumanapura, Mundalama D/S Division, Puttalam District for the constructions under Anamaduwa Water Supply Project
